data.name: logik
data.detailed_description:
Solve Puzzles!

In logik, you can solve many chill & challenging puzzles of varying difficulty. Puzzles are organized into sections, each with unique color schemes.

Puzzle Types

There are two types of puzzles that are playable: regular and slide levels. Regular levels have scenarios where the player must move the striped block out of the puzzle area. Slide levels start with the striped block being mis-aligned to the exit, allowing the player to slide the striped block, with other blocks, in line with the exit.

An Extra Challenge

If you’re looking for an extra challenge on top of the rest of the challenging puzzles, there is Challenge Mode! Challenge Mode is a way to escape the main sections and try something…well, a little more difficult

Is this game for you?

If you are unsure if this game is for you, take this quick test below!

1. Puzzle
2. Challenging
3. Chill/Relaxing
4. Stylized Graphics
5. Atmospheric

If you like some of these genres, you will probably like logik!

(Note: This game and descriptions are subject to change. Nothing is final yet.)

data.short_description: A minimalistic, stylized puzzle game where you have to move the striped block through a maze of cubes, out of the puzzle area. Progress through cute, colorful sections of puzzles as you try to uncover the solutions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8
  • Processor: Intel Core i4/Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any (Graphics are not too demanding)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: None of these requirements are final.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, i7 / Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1680 / Equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: None of these requirements are final.
